text: ā mahāsaṅgama divasaṁ allāhu niṅṅaḷeyellāṁ orumiccukūṭṭumpēāḷ; ōrkkuka, atatre lābhacētaṅṅaḷuṭe divasaṁ. allāhuvil viśvasikkukayuṁ salkkarmaṅṅaḷanuṣṭhikkukayuṁ ceytavanṟe pāpaṅṅaḷ allāhu māyccu kaḷayuṁ. tāḻbhāgattūṭe āṟukaḷeāḻukunna svargīyārāmaṅṅaḷil avare pravēśippikkukayuṁ ceyyuṁ. avaratil nityavāsikaḷāyirikkuṁ. atāṇ atimahattāya vijayaṁ
